## Package Info

The 'Fars.Assignment' package has been created to support the last assignment in the Building R Packages course on Coursera. The package contains 5 functions, which can be used to read and analyize datasets from the "Fatality Analysis Reporting System". These functions are the following:
- fars_map_state
- fars_read
- fars_read_years
- fars_summarize_years
- make_filename

The package can be downloaded from GitHub repository.

## Functionality

The manuals for the fucntions included in the package can be found under the /man directory with examples on how to use them.
